trans-unit.source: Provides information about the intersection between the geometries in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" /> and the visual which was hit.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre a interseção entre as geometrias no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" /> e o visual que recebeu um clique.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the visual geometry (the red square).
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra a relação entre a geometria de teste de clique (o círculo azul) e a visual geometria (o quadrado vermelho).

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama de IntersectionDetail usado no teste de hit](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "diagrama de IntersectionDetail usado no teste de clique")

trans-unit.source: Intersection between hit test geometry and visual geometry during hit testing
trans-unit.target: Interseção entre a geometria de teste de clique e geometry visual durante o teste de clique

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.IntersectionDetail%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.IntersectionDetail%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, do not intersect.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de teste de clique <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> e o visual de destino ou a geometria não se interseccionam.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter is fully contained within the boundary of the target visual or geometry.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de teste de clique <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> está totalmente contido no limite do visual ou da geometria de destino.

trans-unit.source: The target visual, or geometry, is fully inside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter.
trans-unit.target: O visual de destino ou a geometria está totalmente dentro do parâmetro de teste de clique <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, intersect.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de teste de clique <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> e o visual de destino ou a geometria, se interseccionam.

trans-unit.source: This means that the two elements overlap, but neither element contains the other.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que os dois elementos se sobrepõem, mas nenhum elemento contém o outro.
